import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

df = pd.read_csv('../input/predicting-student-performance/amsPredictionSheet11-201010-101537.csv')

source.9e4b8aac:
from sklearn.preprocessing import MinMaxScaler
Scaler = MinMaxScaler()
df_values = df.values
df_valued = Scaler.fit_transform(df_values)
normalized_df = pd.DataFrame(df_valued)
normalized_df
source.0c686d9b:
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
std_scaler = StandardScaler()
df_values = df.values
df_std = std_scaler.fit_transform(df_values)
std_df = pd.DataFrame(df_std)
std_df
